product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
Made me Break Out a Little
body: I bought this product after seeing a beauty blogger's review about it. Since I have hyper pigmentation from not using sun screen in my youth, I've been trying to find ways to stop or reverse it. I also bought and tried out other products in conjunction with this one as part of a skin care routine, but I noticed that my skin would break out in very small pimples sometimes. After testing and leaving out products to figure out what was making my skin like this, I discovered that when I stopped using this product, I no longer got those small pimples. My skin is somewhat sensitive, so maybe that's one of the reasons, or some ingredient I'm slightly allergic to? I'm not sure. But I wasn't completely surprised as I did notice my face felt just a tad tingly and extra sensitive after using it (even with just one drop, no more than two, each night). During the time I did use it, which was for a few weeks, I have about half the bottle left, I didn't notice my spots lightening or even staying the same. Actually, they got very slightly darker; even though, I used sun screen. I don't necessarily attribute that occurrence to this product though, but certainly I was disappointed that this did nothing for me even after being patient and using it consistently for a while to see its effects. Maybe it'll work for others as the other reviews seem to suggest.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: THE ORDINARY Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 30ml, 1.01 Fl Oz, Liquid (Pack of 1)
title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
Leaves a precipitous thin film that forms skin rolls when pressure is applied
body: It leaves a thin film of some precipitous stuff on the skin that forms rolls when I apply pressure while applying foundation. To avoid getting ‚Äúskin rolls (ew)‚Äù, I apply only a small amount in the center of the face in the morning. I‚Äôm wondering if it‚Äôs because of zinc, so I will try another product to see if the same happens.It looks like I got the real product, comparing off the other reviews. It‚Äôs quite moisturizing and thicker than other serums I use. I‚Äôve been using it for 2 weeks, and I didn‚Äôt get any reaction. While there isn‚Äôt anything wrong with this product other than skin rolls, I didn‚Äôt know it‚Äôs supposed to be only $5 offline, so there‚Äôs another strong motivation to try other niacinamide products.
